title: New: Beat Connection – Think/Feel (Feat. Chelsey Scheffe)
body:
Nothing screams ‘I CAN’T WAIT FOR SUMMER’ like a new single from Seattle four piece **Beat Connection**.

With their debut _**Surf Noir EP**_ being one of the finest short length releases of 2011, and a full LP in the pipeline, they may well be your soundtrack for the coming months. Enlisting the vocals of designer **Chelsey Scheffe**, and a healthy dose of reverb, _Think/Feel_ is majestic and gloriously upbeat, worthy of gracing indie dancefloors across the world. Check it out below.
